title: Pixel 5 connected to a USB C Power / Audio Splitter breaks dictation
content:
When I am have a USB C splitter attached to the pixel 5 (was same with 2 XL) dictation in the gboard keyboard can't hear me. 
It also seems like you have to shout for assistant if it hears you at all. 
Anyone else experienced this or have a fix or work around that isn't unplug it?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
